citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15am on
September 8th 2022. The inspector followed the instructions posted outside of the classroom door specifically for USDA
inspectors. Phone calls were made to the Attending Veterinarian, a secondary veterinarian, and then to campus security
when the other calls went to voicemail. Campus security contacted the program director, who then contacted the
inspector within 20 minutes. The program director stated that they would prefer to have the inspection after classes had
resumed (September 19th), despite being told that this would result in an attempted inspection. The program director
stated that they understood the end result, but that the timing of the inspection after start of classes would ensure
someone would be available to assist the inspector.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15am on 
September 8th 2022. The inspector followed the instructions posted outside of the classroom door specifically for USDA 
inspectors.  Phone calls were made to the Attending Veterinarian, a secondary veterinarian, and then to campus security 
when the other calls went to voicemail.  Campus security contacted the program director, who then contacted the 
inspector within 20 minutes.  The program director stated that they would prefer to have the inspection after classes had 
resumed (September 19th), despite being told that this would result in an attempted inspection.  The program director 
stated that they understood the end result, but that the timing of the inspection after start of classes would ensure 
someone would be available to assist the inspector. 
 
 
 
End Section
